text: O Yeong-su (; born October 19, 1944), is a South Korean actor. He began acting in theatre in 1967. He is known for playing Oh Il-nam in the Netflix survival drama Squid Game. In January 2022, he won the Golden Globe Award for this role."Winners and nominees 2022" On March 15, 2024, O was convicted of sexual misconduct. A judge sentenced him to 8 months in prison and 2 years probation. He must also attend 40 hours of classes on sexual violence. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:South Korean movie actors Category:South Korean television actors Category:South Korean stage actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors
title: O Yeong-su (actor)
